bundle.shortDescription: Privacy-respecting, open source break reminder for Windows
bundle.longDescription: Break Reminder Pro is a completely free, open source, and privacy-respecting desktop application designed to help you maintain your health and productivity while working. Features customizable break intervals, smart meeting detection, system tray integration, and multiple break modes. No ads, no tracking, no data collection.
